channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: OpenAI bets big on audio as Silicon Valley declares war on screens
item.description: The form factors may differ, but the thesis is the same: audio is the interface of the future. Every space -- your home, your car, even your face -- i...

item.title: 14 Best Fitness Trackers (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Whether you’re skiing in the backcountry or trampolining in the backyard, we have an activity tracker for you.

item.title: How to Start (and Keep) a Healthy Habit (2026)
item.description: Whether you want to run a marathon or learn to play the guitar, here’s how to set yourself up for success.

item.title: 4 Best Smart Scales (2026), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: If you’re ready to start tracking your weight, BMI, and other health data on your phone, we’ve weighed in on some great options.

item.title: Fizz social app’s CEO on why anon works
item.description: Fizz is betting that Gen Z is tired of performing their lives on Instagram and TikTok. What started as a pandemic-era group chat frustration has turne...

item.title: ‘College dropout’ has become the most coveted startup founder credential
item.description: AI founders are increasingly using their "dropout" status as a credential during YC pitches.

item.title: The top 6 media/entertainment startups from Disrupt Startup Battlefield
item.description: Here is the full list of the media/entertainment Startup Battlefield 200 selectees, along with a note on what made us select them for the competition.

item.title: AI Labor Is Boring. AI Lust Is Big Business
item.description: After years of hype about generative AI increasing productivity and making lives easier, 2025 was the year erotic chatbots defined AI’s narrative.

item.title: European banks plan to cut 200,000 jobs as AI takes hold
item.description: The bloodletting will hit hardest in back-office operations, risk management, and compliance.

item.title: I Tested Popular Functional Coffee Add-Ins for a Week Each (2026)
item.description: Our reviewer optimized his morning cup of coffee with creamer substitutes that promise health benefits and mental clarity.
